text: Lake Lugano or , from ; ; , is a Swiss-Italian lake. It is at the border between Switzerland and Italy. About 2/3 of the lake is in Switzerland, and 1/3 in Italy. The lake, named after the city of Lugano, is between Lake Maggiore and Lake Como. == Notes == Category:Lakes of Ticino Category:Lakes of Lombardy Category:Lugano
title: Lake Lugano
